tasks.task: Preparing garden for spring planting in a cold climate.
subtasks: Inspecting winter sowings for growth.
Protecting tender bedding plants from cold nights.
Monitoring nighttime temperatures and adjusting garden coverings.
Bringing sensitive potted plants indoors when necessary.
Checking frost protection measures for newly planted vegetables.
Assessing hardiness of emerging plants and providing additional care.
Checking local weather forecasts for warm temperatures.
Adjusting planting schedules based on predicted temperatures.
Collecting and preparing materials for future frost protection.
Planning maintenance tasks during the wait for warmer weather.
Identifying dandelion plants in the garden.
Harvesting dandelions while ensuring not to damage the plants.
Collecting dandelions in appropriate quantities for the intended use.
Possibly drying or preparing the dandelions for oil infusion. (implied from the context)
